tool_description: Generates drum and percussion patterns for various musical styles and time signatures.

style.description: Drum style: rock, pop, jazz, latin, electronic, hip-hop

error_messages: Invalid time signature: Use format like 4/4, 3/4, 6/8
Unsupported style: Choose from rock, pop, jazz, latin, electronic, hip-hop
Invalid complexity level: Choose simple, medium, or complex
Tempo out of range: Must be 60-200 BPM
Invalid pattern length: Must be 1-8 bars
usage: Specify time signature and style, optionally set complexity, tempo, and pattern length. Returns drum pattern with kick, snare, and hi-hat patterns.

kick_pattern.description: Boolean array for kick drum hits

snare_pattern.description: Boolean array for snare drum hits
